Name: Amidst The Darkness
About the game: Amidst The Darkness is a truly terrifying short permadeath first-person survival horror experience. Dragged, bloodied and bruised into old dilapidated worker halls, Amidst The Darkness follows the story of a sadistic entity - known informally as The Being. Trawl your way through old abandoned halls and sewers in a bid to find an escape. No matter where you go, or the route that you take, The Being will unpredictably follow your every move. Creeping closer step-by-step, inch-by-inch until it is within reaching distance. The crows scarpering from their nest nearby, or that unmistakable slow-moving silhouette in the distance - it beckons upon thee. Features Immersive First-Person Horror: Navigate through chilling, immersive environments. Permadeath: Escape the grips of intense chases with no do-overs. Unpredictable AI: Dynamic AI system to allow for unpredictability, no two playthroughs are the same. Note: Amidst The Darkness is a short experimental permadeath experience approximately 45 minutes in length, but may require more than one playthrough.
